articles.title: Red Planet Revelations: NASA's Perseverance Rover Probes Secrets of Ancient Martian Lake - SciTechDaily

articles.content: NASA’s Perseverance rover, on its 1,000th Martian day, has collected important samples in Jezero Crater, uncovering evidence of a past lake and conditions potentially suitable for life. These finding… [+7791 chars]

articles.title: NASA says Asteroid 2023 XB12 will pass Earth for the first time ever; Know details of this close encounter - HT Tech
articles.description: An Apollo group asteroid designated as Asteroid 2023 XB12 is expected to pass Earth today, December 14, NASA has revealed. Know its speed, size, distance of approach, and other details.

articles.title: Asia Predatory Lending Apps Claim Victims by Offering Easy Money - Bloomberg
articles.description: Authorities and tech companies are in a game of cat and mouse with criminals who use apps to extract sensitive information and money from people looking to borrow.
articles.content: The trouble often starts with social media ads. Get a $500 personal loan in 20 minutes, the ads on Facebook or Instagram say. No documentation needed, just download this app. When prospective borrowe… [+851 chars]
